1: To you, Yahweh, I lift up my life!\q
3:
May no one who hopes in you be disgraced\q may those who act treacherously without cause be ashamed!


\q
4:
Make known to me your ways, Yahweh;\q teach me your paths.
\q
6:
Call to mind, Yahweh, your acts of compassion and of covenant faithfulness;\q for they have always existed.
\q
7:
Do not think about the sins of my youth or my rebelliousness;\q Call me to mind with covenant faithfulness because of your goodness, Yahweh!


\q
8:
Yahweh is good and upright;\q therefore he teaches sinners the way.
\q
9:
He guides the humble in what is right\q and he teaches them his way.


\q
10:
All the paths of Yahweh are steadfast love and faithfulness\q to those who keep his covenant and his solemn commands.
\q
11:
For your name's sake, Yahweh,\q pardon my sin, for it is great.


\q
12:
Who is the man who fears Yahweh?\q The Lord will instruct him in the way that he should choose.
\q
13:
His life will go along in goodness;\q and his descendants will inherit the land.


\q
14:
The friendship of Yahweh is for those who honor him,\q and he makes his covenant known to them.
\q
15:
My eyes are always on Yahweh,\q for he will free my feet from the net.
\q
16:
Turn toward me and have mercy on me;\q for I am alone and afflicted.


\q
17:
The troubles of my heart are enlarged;\q draw me out from my distress!
\q
18:
See my affliction and my toils;\q forgive all my sins.
\q
19:
See my enemies, for they are many;\q they hate me with cruel hatred.


\q
20:
Protect my life and rescue me;\q do not let me be humiliated, for I take refuge in you!
\q
21:
May integrity and uprightness preserve me,\q for I hope in you.


\q
22: Rescue Israel, God,\q from all of his troubles!
